Sentencas: This study focuses on enhancing the efficiency of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) by modulating the thickness of the highly resistive solid solution layer of (Ce,Zr)O-2 formed between the yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte and the CeO2-based interlayer on the cathode side.
Titulo: Characterization of yttrium-doped ceria with various yttrium concentrations as cathode interlayers of SOFCs

Sentencas: The effects of the concentration of dopant in CeO2 on the thickness of the solid solution were analyzed.
Titulo: Characterization of yttrium-doped ceria with various yttrium concentrations as cathode interlayers of SOFCs

Sentencas: Yttrium-doped CeO2 (YDC) interlayers were studied, with dopant concentrations in the range of 5-40 mol%.
Titulo: Characterization of yttrium-doped ceria with various yttrium concentrations as cathode interlayers of SOFCs

Sentencas: The results revealed that the thickness of the solid solution decreased with increasing dopant concentration up to 20 mol% and then saturated at higher dopant concentrations.
Titulo: Characterization of yttrium-doped ceria with various yttrium concentrations as cathode interlayers of SOFCs

Sentencas: In addition, the electrical conductivities of yttrium-doped ceria (YDC) and the solid solution of YSZ and YDC were measured.
Titulo: Characterization of yttrium-doped ceria with various yttrium concentrations as cathode interlayers of SOFCs

Sentencas: YDC with a dopant concentration of 20 mol% exhibited the highest conductivity.
Titulo: Characterization of yttrium-doped ceria with various yttrium concentrations as cathode interlayers of SOFCs

Sentencas: The conductivities of the YSZ/YDC solid solution decreased compared to those of YDC and YSZ for each dopant concentration, and the extent of the reductions was approximately the same for all dopant concentrations.
Titulo: Characterization of yttrium-doped ceria with various yttrium concentrations as cathode interlayers of SOFCs

Sentencas: These results indicate that a dopant concentration of 20 mol% is optimal to minimize the internal resistance of SOFCs when YDC is used as the interlayer material.
Titulo: Characterization of yttrium-doped ceria with various yttrium concentrations as cathode interlayers of SOFCs
